title: Coexisting of COX7A2L-ALK, LINC01210-ALK, ATP13A4-ALK and Acquired SLCO2A1-ALK in a Lung Adenocarcinoma with Rearrangements Loss During the Treatment of Crizotinib and Ceritinib: A Case Report
